alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 7:31AM EST until January 03 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Mason County in northern Kentucky... Northern Lewis County in northeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Brown County in southwestern Ohio... Southern Adams County in southwestern Ohio... Southwestern Scioto County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 800 AM EST. * At 730 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Maysville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, West Union, Manchester, Aberdeen, Vanceburg, Lewisburg, Tollesboro, Rome, Blue Creek, Concord, Trinity, Bradysville, Rectorville, Ribolt, Bentonville, Cedar Mills, Sandy Springs, Buena Vista in Scioto County and Moranburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
